resources.string: Traditional bakery in Jardim Universal, offering fresh breads, snacks, cakes and bakery products. Quality service for years in the neighborhood.
Company specialized in vehicle fleet management. Rental, maintenance and fleet administration services for companies.
Environmental analysis laboratory specialized in water, effluent and soil analysis. Certified and with qualified professionals.
Distributor of bearings, bushings, belts and industrial parts. Service for industries and commerce in the region.
Workshop specialized in diesel engines and heavy vehicles. Maintenance, repairs and parts for trucks and buses.
Travel and exchange agency. National and international packages, air tickets, accommodation and cultural exchange programs.
